text: Kosoy, Kosoi or Cosoi ( meaning slanting, oblique, etc.) is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Kosaya. It may refer to *Feodosy Kosoy (fl. 1550s), Russian serf-monk *Stewart Kosoy (1950–2015), American video game designer *Vasily Kosoy (1421–1448), Grand Prince of Moscow *Vassian Patrikeyev (Vassian Kosoy), Russian ecclesiastic and political figure and writer Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Kosoy
